txt.en: 'Athelbald went out to hunt for boar-meat some time ago and has yet to return. Would you go look for him in the woods to the east of the farm and see that he returns safely?'
Athelbald is hunting boar-meat in the woods to the east of the Folde Farm.\n\nWitgil asked you to find Athelbald and see to it that he returns safely to the Folde Farm.
'Orcs? I do not fear Orcs. I shall complete my task ere I return to the farm. The meat I collect is necessary to feed the people of Aldburg.'
'These boars have been more aggressive lately.'
You came to the Folde Farm to warn Witgil of the imminent Orc-attack.
'These boars have been more aggressive lately.'
Athelbald is hunting boar-meat in the woods to the east of the Folde Farm.\n\nWitgil asked you to find Athelbald and see to it that he returns safely to the Folde Farm.
